metadata.narrative: Alchemically enhanced steel forged from mithril and crystalline coal. The air crystals infuse the metal with supernatural lightness. Stronger than mundane steel, yet weighs like aluminum.
Crystallized blood from elemental beasts, refined through frost and fang. Pulses with residual power, warm to the touch. Essential for advanced healing and buff potions.
Orange-red crystal pulsing with trapped flames, crystallized from shale and phoenix ash. Warm to touch, occasionally sparks. The eternal fire of the phoenix never truly dies.
Combining all basic elements into harmony. Balance in a bottle, shimmering with prismatic light. All elemental forces recognize you as kin and refuse to harm their own.

items.name: Elemental Harmony Potion
items.effect: Grants 30% resistance to all elements for 10 minutes

metadata.narrative: Universal solvent that can dissolve anything through storm-charged marble and frost. Handle with extreme care - it wants to unmake things. The void makes it hungry, the lightning makes it fast.

items.name: Universal Solvent
items.effect: Can dissolve most materials - use carefully

metadata.narrative: Oil that makes tools work faster and smoother, infused with earth's stability and life essence. Apply it before work and watch efficiency soar. Craftsmen swear by this formula.

items.name: Efficiency Oil
items.effect: Apply to tools for +15% gathering speed for 1 hour

metadata.narrative: Polish that makes armor gleam and deflect attacks, blessed by marble and frost. Knights pay fortunes for this. The sheen isn't just for show - it actually turns blades.

items.name: Armor Polish
items.effect: Apply to armor for +10% defense for 2 hours

metadata.narrative: Distilled from void essence and spectral thread, this potion bends light around you. Your form wavers, becoming transparent like morning mist. Walk unseen among enemies.
Potion that transforms your lungs to extract oxygen from water. Gills form temporarily, water becomes breathable air. Dive deep without fear of drowning.
Antidote brewed from dire fang venom and purifying frost. Neutralizes toxins instantly, turning poison to harmless water. Every adventurer's lifeline against venomous beasts.
Crystalline quartz amplifies magical energies, bound with frost and water. Restores mystical reserves instantly. Mages treasure this azure liquid more than gold.

The legendary catalyst of transmutation, forged from storm hearts and void essence. Transmutes base metals to gold, catalyzes impossible reactions. Alchemists spend lifetimes seeking this singular treasure.

items.name: Philosopher's Stone
items.effect: Legendary transmutation catalyst - enables impossible alchemical reactions

metadata.narrative: Phoenix ash ignites primal fury within, living ichor remembers the hunt. Drink this and become unstoppable - pain fades, strength surges, enemies fall like wheat. The rage consumes everything.

items.name: Berserker Rage Potion
items.effect: +35% damage and +25% attack speed, but -10% defense

metadata.narrative: Simple brew from wolf pelt and earth crystal that steadies nerves. Fear becomes manageable, doubts fade. Not true bravery, but sometimes liquid courage is enough.

items.name: Liquid Courage
items.effect: Grants immunity to fear effects for 3 minutes

metadata.narrative: Phoenix ash defies gravity while essence blood remembers flight. Drink this and rise - your feet leave the ground, air becomes solid beneath you. Soar above earthbound concerns.

items.name: Levitation Elixir
items.effect: Grants levitation and slow falling for 4 minutes

metadata.narrative: Crackling crystal surrounded by static discharge, crystallized from raw lightning and amplifying quartz. Handle with insulated gloves. Contains bottled storm fury.
Spectral thread accelerates your temporal flow, lightning quickens reactions. Time seems to slow around you. Your movements blur, strikes land before enemies can react.
Basic healing potion from natural herbs and monster carapace. Every alchemist's first creation. Tastes terrible, works wonderfully - wounds close and pain fades within moments.
Improved healing potion using living ichor to amplify restorative properties. The liquid shimmers with captured vitality. One swallow and you feel strength returning.
Powerful healing elixir using essence blood and lightning to catalyze regeneration. Closes wounds rapidly, mends broken bones, restores vitality. The taste of life itself.
Strength-enhancing elixir using living ichor and elemental power. Muscles surge with supernatural power, every strike hits harder. Feel primal ferocity flowing through you.
Defense-boosting potion using golem essence and living ichor. Skin hardens like stone, blows that should fell you merely bruise. Stand firm, unbreakable.
Speed-enhancing draught using fire crystals and essence blood. Time seems to slow around you. Your movements blur, strikes land before enemies can react.
Fire resistance potion using lightning and flame to create thermal immunity. Body temperature regulates perfectly. Walk through flames unscathed, fire becomes gentle warmth.
Frost resistance potion using void essence to create internal warmth. Cold cannot touch you. Ice shatters against your skin, blizzards feel like spring breezes.
Regeneration tonic infused with lightning and spectral essence. Mends wounds over time, body remembers how to heal itself. Feel vitality flowing back minute by minute.

items.name: Regeneration Tonic
items.effect: Restores 75 HP instantly and 5 HP per second

metadata.narrative: Legendary brew combining void essence with spectral power. Maximum HP surges, strength magnifies tenfold. For a brief time, you become something more than mortal.
Alchemically transmuted tin from iron and earth essence. Lighter than iron, more malleable. Essential for bronze alloys and soft metal applications.
Alchemically enhanced steel forged from iron and coal through fire's blessing. Harder than mundane steel, holds an edge longer. The foundation of superior weaponry.
Crystallized blood from elemental beasts, refined through frost and fang. Pulses with residual power, warm to the touch. Essential for advanced healing and buff potions.
Orange-red crystal pulsing with trapped flames, crystallized from shale and phoenix ash. Warm to touch, occasionally sparks. The eternal fire of the phoenix never truly dies.
Combining all basic elements into harmony. Balance in a bottle, shimmering with prismatic light. All elemental forces recognize you as kin and refuse to harm their own.

items.name: Elemental Harmony Potion
items.effect: Grants 30% resistance to all elements for 10 minutes

metadata.narrative: Universal solvent that can dissolve anything through frost-charged phoenix ash. Handle with extreme care - it wants to unmake things. Pure and pristine, dangerously hungry.

items.name: Universal Solvent
items.effect: Can dissolve most materials - use carefully

metadata.narrative: Oil that makes tools work faster and smoother, blessed by ancient golems. Apply it before work and watch efficiency soar. Master craftsmen guard this ancient formula.

items.name: Efficiency Oil
items.effect: Apply to tools for +15% gathering speed for 1 hour

metadata.narrative: Polish that makes armor gleam and deflect attacks, crafted from flawless materials. Knights pay fortunes for this. The sheen isn't just for show - it actually turns blades.

items.name: Armor Polish
items.effect: Apply to armor for +10% defense for 2 hours

Potion that transforms your lungs to extract oxygen from water using flawless crystals. Gills form temporarily, water becomes breathable air. Dive deep without fear of drowning.
Antidote brewed from pure dire fang venom and purifying frost. Neutralizes toxins instantly, turning poison to harmless water. Every adventurer's lifeline against venomous beasts.
Brilliant crystalline quartz amplifies magical energies, bound with frost and granite. Restores mystical reserves instantly. Mages treasure this radiant azure liquid more than gold.

The legendary catalyst of transmutation, forged from phoenix ash and storm hearts. Transmutes base metals to gold, catalyzes impossible reactions. Alchemists spend lifetimes seeking this singular treasure.

items.name: Philosopher's Stone
items.effect: Legendary transmutation catalyst - enables impossible alchemical reactions

items.name: Berserker Rage Potion
items.effect: +35% damage and +25% attack speed, but -10% defense

metadata.narrative: Simple brew from wolf pelt and brilliant earth crystal that steadies nerves. Fear becomes manageable, doubts fade. Not true bravery, but sometimes liquid courage is enough.

items.name: Liquid Courage
items.effect: Grants immunity to fear effects for 3 minutes

metadata.narrative: Shiny phoenix ash defies gravity while spectral thread remembers flight. Drink this and rise - your feet leave the ground, air becomes solid beneath you. Soar above earthbound concerns.

items.name: Levitation Elixir
items.effect: Grants levitation and slow falling for 4 minutes

metadata.narrative: Crackling crystal surrounded by static discharge, crystallized from shadow lightning and amplifying quartz. Handle with insulated gloves. Contains bottled storm fury.
Glowing spectral thread accelerates your temporal flow, shadow essence quickens reactions. Time seems to slow around you. Your movements blur, strikes land before enemies can react.
Basic healing potion from frost-blessed carapace and slime gel. Every alchemist's first creation. Tastes terrible, works wonderfully - wounds close and pain fades within moments.
Improved healing potion using iron scales to amplify restorative properties. The liquid shimmers with metallic vitality. One swallow and you feel strength returning.
Powerful healing elixir using light gems and spectral essence. Closes wounds rapidly, mends broken bones, restores vitality. The taste of captured starlight.
Strength-enhancing elixir using enchanted fire and dire fangs. Muscles surge with supernatural power, every strike hits harder. Feel primal ferocity flowing through you.
Defense-boosting potion using dark essence blood and iron scales. Skin hardens like shadow-forged metal, blows that should fell you merely bruise. Stand firm, unbreakable.
Speed-enhancing draught using dusty water crystals and essence blood. Time seems to slow around you. Your movements blur, strikes land before enemies can react.
